JavaScript

Posted Jun 1, 2025 Updated Sep 11, 2025
By Yerin Kim
3 min read
JavaScript
JavaScript

JavaScript is a dynamic, weakly typed programming language which is compiled at runtime. It can be executed as part of a webpage in a browser or directly on any machine (â€œhost environmentâ€).

JavaScript was created to make webpages more dynamic (e.g. change content on a page directly from inside the browser). Originally, it was called LiveScript but due to the popularity of Java, it was renamed to JavaScript.
